original: 關羽提刀，飛身上馬。眾諸侯聽到關外鼓聲大振，喊聲大舉。關羽頃刻間便提了華雄首級回營，眾人大驚，此時酒且尚溫！
text: Guan Yu lifted the knife and flew onto the horse. When the princes heard the drums outside the pass, they shouted loudly. Guan Yu immediately mentioned Hua Xiong's first-level return to camp, and everyone was shocked. At this time, the wine was still warm!
